sentences.english: Hetian is located in a fertile oasis, blessed with a variety of fruits.

sentences.english: Hetian Prefecture belongs to extreme arid climate, The habitat is quite bitter.

sentences.english: Hetian was the center of the Buddhist faith in the early years of Western Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 和田是早期中的中国西域历史中的佛教中心。
